bio

I am a Web Developer with focus on front-end technologies, I Studied Computer Games Development at the University of Westminster, and have graduated with Honours. I have worked in a variety of roles allowing me to sharpen key skills that are necessary for a successful career.

A recent hobby of mine has been experimenting with photography using the popular social network app, Instagram. You can find my gallery below showcasing some of my latest pictures.
